snippet.title: Helvetii | 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist & Download the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1094590/Helvetii/
Site: https://helvetii-game.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/@HelvetiiGame

A rot has taken over the land of the Helvetii tribes, corrupting the soil, and turning men and animals into monsters and awakening forbidden powers. A young war-chief, a beast-man and a wise druid embark on a journey to the mountains in the east, where the heart of the curse lies, and save their homes.

Helvetii is a 2D Action-Roguelite set in ancient Gaul, where godly powers and deadly creatures await you. Fight your way through colorful Gaulish landscapes as 3 different characters, and arm yourself with a collection of artifacts and the help of powerful ancient gods.

Coming in 2022 for Steam (Windows and Linux) and Nintendo Switch
